price: Fakat biz azabı üzerlerinden kaldırınca hemen verdikleri sözü bozdular.
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
